decision_conditions: Condition : 1 - The construction of the glazed enclosure hereby permitted shall be begun before the expiration of three years from the date of this permission.

Condition : 2 - The proposed development shall be carried out in all respects in accordance with the proposals contained in the application and the plans submitted (  ) therewith and approved by the Local Planning Authority, or as shall have been otherwise agreed in writing by the Local Planning Authority before the building is used.
Condition : 3 - No additional doors, windows or other glazed openings shall be inserted in the building without the prior written consent of the Local Planning Authority.

Condition : 4 - 4.	The windows formed in the eastern and western flank elevations of the Church Hall part of the building shall be obscure glazed, fixed shut and shall not be repaired or replaced otherwise than with obscured glazing.

Condition : 5 - 5.	The Approved Travel Plan (under application 01056/C/P9) shall be implemented in accordance with the timescales specified therein, unless alternative timescales are agreed in writing with the Local Planning Authority. The Approved Travel Plan shall be monitored and reviewed in accordance with the agreed Travel Plan targets to the satisfaction of the Local Planning Authority.
description: Variation of condition 2 (Plans) and condition 4 (Windows & Doors) to allow for a glazed enclosure to the 2nd floor terrace of planning permission 01056/C/P10 dated 26/11/2014
